description: Enterprise techniques used by OnionDuke, ATT&CK software S0052 v1.0
name: OnionDuke (S0052)

techniques.comment: OnionDuke steals credentials from its victims.
OnionDuke uses HTTP and HTTPS for C2.
OnionDuke uses Twitter as a backup C2 method. It also has a module designed to post messages to the Russian VKontakte social media site.
